en.title: MYSORE PROGRAMME
en.subtitle: Ashtanga Yoga · Traditional Practice
en.intro: Mysore is the most traditional way to practice Ashtanga Yoga. Each student practises a fixed sequence at their own pace and from memory, whilst the teacher provides individualised guidance and adjustments.

features.description: Based on the traditional Ashtanga practice method

features.title: Continuous Refinement

en.teacherIntro: Each practitioner embodies a unique inner landscape and individual rhythm of growth. My online classes are built upon daily practice, sharing insights and wisdom that emerge organically. As a fellow traveller, I walk alongside you on this journey of unifying knowledge and action, supporting yoga as it evolves from a mat-based practice into an art of living.

zh.teacherIntro: 每位练习者，都有其独特的内在风景与成长节奏。我的线上课程，以每日练习为土壤，分享由此生发的体悟与智慧。我以同行者之姿，陪伴你踏上这趟知行合一的探索之旅，让瑜伽从垫上的练习，成为生活的艺术。
